body_html: @mldm4 I have also replied to you at 15604, the issue is not really that I couldn't get it to work, I know what the problem is. I just need this to be fixed, or mentioned more specifically (it already is, just not that clearly) in the TensorFlow docs, and included in the common installation problems.
